messages.title: The Stephen Timms Politics School
messages.content: A Labour government will create a fairer society which works for everyone. If re-elected, I will continue to devote my energies to the people of East Ham over the next Parliament.

messages.title: Food banks and welfare
messages.content: I have spoken out against the dramatic rise in the use of food banks...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Supporting job creation in East Ham
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure opportunities for all and support young people in jobs.
Defend the local NHS and continue to oppose the Coalition's NHS reforms.

issues.health: Defend the local NHS and continue to oppose the Coalition's NHS reforms.
issues.socialWelfare: I have spoken out against the dramatic rise in the use of food banks...

leaflet.personalStatement: A Labour government will create a fairer society which works for everyone. If re-elected, I will continue to devote my energies to the people of East Ham over the next Parliament.

contactInformation.address: Newham Labour Party Gerry Kaufman House 349-351 High Street, Stratford London, E15 4QZ

images.caption: Stephen at the Houses of Parliament

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet also includes handwritten notes potentially from constituents.
